subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton’s layup with 4.7 seconds left pushed the Bobcats past the 76ers — a night after Charlotte’s 97-91 loss to the previously winless Nets.
snippet: Raymond Felton’s layup with 4.7 seconds left pushed the Bobcats past the 76ers — a night after Charlotte’s 97-91 loss to the previously winless Nets.
